titleStmt.title: Explanatory notes upon a mendacious libel called Concubinage and poligamy disproved; written by a nameless author, in answer to a book writ by J.B. as being a scurrilous libel, as not fit to be stiled an answer. As may appear, by a catalogue of notorious and villainous lies, and Billingsgate raileries, and dunghil language, to be shewed therein. By J.B. B.D.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Butler)

titleStmt.title: Explanatory notes upon a mendacious libel called Concubinage and poligamy disproved; written by a nameless author, in answer to a book writ by J.B. as being a scurrilous libel, as not fit to be stiled an answer. As may appear, by a catalogue of notorious and villainous lies, and Billingsgate raileries, and dunghil language, to be shewed therein. By J.B. B.D.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Butler)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author. And are to be sold by most booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Concubinage and poligamy disproved.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
